name: Vicodin (hydrocodone/acetaminophen)
description: Vicodin is a popular drug for treating acute or chronic moderate to moderately severe pain

name: Albuterol (Accuneb, Ventolin, Proair)
description: Albuterol sulphate dilates the airways of the lung and is used for treating asthma and other conditions of the lung

name: Lisinopril (Generic for Prinivil)
description: Lisinopril is an angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor used for treating high blood pressure.

name: Levothyroxine (generic for Synthroid)
description: Levothyroxine is a man-made version of thyroid hormone. It is used for treating hypothyroidism.

name: Gabapentin (Neurontin)
description: Gabapentin is an anti-seizure drug that is used for preventing seizures and for treating post-herpetic.

name: Metformin (generic for Glucophage)
description: Metformin is used alone or in combination with other drugs for treating type 2 diabetes in adults.

name: Lipitor (atorvastatin)
description: Lipitor is a "statin" (HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors) approved for treating high cholesterol. It also prevents chest pain,

name: Amlodipine (generic for Norvasc)
description: Amlodipine is a calcium channel blocker used for treating high blood pressure and for treatment and prevention of chest pain.

name: Omeprazole (Prilosec)
description: Omeprazole is in a class of drugs called proton pump inhibitors (PPI) that block the production of acid by the stomach.
